modName: Hearthfire Homes - Interior Lighting for ENB
summary: The interior lights of Lakeview Manor, Windstad Manor and Heljarchen Hall from the Hearthfire Expansion, have been altered to make them brighter when using ENB with dark interiors.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/HearthfireTitle_zps642ef82f.jpg[/IMG]

Hearthfire Homes - Interior Lighting for ENB V1.2

This is a mod created for a user request on the Mod Forums.

[color=#00FF00]The interior lights of Lakeview Manor, Windstad Manor and Heljarchen Hall from the Hearthfire Expansion, have been altered to make them brighter when using ENB with dark interiors.[/color]

[color=#00FFFF]NEW!! Version 1.2 completely redone - better lighting - No shadows![/color]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/HearthfireInstall_zpsd86e1e61.jpg[/IMG]

[color=#FFFF00]Installation:
Download and install with Nexus Mod Manager.[/color]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/HeartRequire_zps8d3e33ce.jpg[/IMG]

[color=#00FF00]Requires Hearthfire Expansion.[/color]

[color=#00FFFF]The mod is designed to be used in conjunction with the ENB of your choice. 
It has been tested using my own ENB available here:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27935/] SoulMasters ENB[/url]  [/color]

Feel free to leave any comments, bug reports etc.

I hope some people may find this useful?

[color=#00FFFF]Please take note: If you are using a pirated (ie non Steam enabled) version of the game, please do not leave comments about how this part of my mod or that is not working on your game! I am not prepared to waste my time trying to help you out with your illegal software! I\'m unemployed, but still manage to pay for my games (they are what keep me sane) so if I can, you should be able to as well![/color]

SoulMasterII

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/sm0g9rv24znf_zps9d795d9a.gif[/IMG]

[color=#FF0000]Version History:
V1.0 Initial upload
V1.1 Added lighting for Windstad Manor and Heljarchen Hall
V1.2 Complete overhaul - better lighting no shadows[/color]

[color=#FFFF00]Please, DO NOT upload any part of my mods anywhere else![/color]
author: SoulMasterII
